seo.title: Car rentals in Lincoln, NE | FriendRenter

pickupAreas.name: Haymarket
pickupAreas.tip: Meet in a well-lit public lot.

faq.q: Is street parking okay for pickup?
faq.a: Hosts will specify; most meet in public lots or garages.
Book early and allow extra time downtown on big weekends.
Follow pickup notes; allow time to clear snow/ice and check tires.
A temporary hold (e.g., $200–$300) is placed and released after return if no issues.
If the car is available — request in advance in the app.
